taskbody.context: An operation contains a list of parts necessary to execute an operation. As an operator, you can access the BOM section in the application to consume the BOM parts in a Production Unit.

step.cmd: In the Machines drop-down list box, select a machine.
step.stepresult: The Open page appears, displaying a list of operations associated with the selected machine.

step.cmd: In the Open page, select an operation, and then select the BOM tab.
step.stepresult: The BOM section appears, displaying the BOM parts associated with the selected operation.

step.cmd: Refer to each field for a BOM part that appears in the BOM section as described in the following table.

row.entry: The recommended order of consumption of the BOM part in an operation.
The BOM part number associated with the consumable material lots.
The description of the BOM part.
The planned quantity of the BOM parts required for the completion of an operation.
The actual quantity of the BOM parts consumed during the production.
The unit of measure (UOM) of the BOM part.

info.note: In the BOM section, you can resize the field (column heading) in the grid using a drag-and-drop operation. You can also hover over the field (column heading) until appears to resize the width of the field column in the grid table.

step.cmd: In the BOM section, select a part.
step.stepresult: The page containing the part details and consumption history appears.

taskbody.result: The BOM parts for the selected operation appear in the application.
